snippet: The San-Diego-Oakland game was televised at 8:35 p.m., Pacific time, a rarity for prime-time televised games. Local California stations got a boost in ratings, but East Coast viewership dropped.
abstract: Oakland Raiders defeat San-Diego Chargers, 27-17, in game televised at rare, late 8:35 pm, Pacific time; local California stations got a boost in ratings, but East Coast viewership dropped.
lead_paragraph: The San-Diego-Oakland game was televised at 8:35 p.m., Pacific time, a rarity for prime-time televised games. Local California stations got a boost in ratings, but East Coast viewership dropped.

headline.main: East Coast Calls It a Night for a West Coast Game
headline.print_headline: Late West Coast Game Has a Drop in Viewership
